children.description: Content rendered inside the input group item. (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the input group item.

isBox.description: Enables box styling to the input group item

isDisabled.description: Flag to indicate if the input group item is disabled.

isFill.description: Flag to indicate if the input group item should fill the available horizontal space

isPlain.description: Flag to indicate if the input group item is plain.
